titleStmt.title: A second discourse in vindication of the Protestant grounds of faith, against the pretence of infallibility in the Roman Church in answer to The guide in controversies by R.H., Protestancy without principles, and Reason and religion, or, The certain rule of faith by E.W. : with a particular enquiry into the miracles of the Roman Church / by Edward Stillingfleet ...
titleStmt.author: Stillingfleet, Edward, 1635-1699.

titleStmt.title: A second discourse in vindication of the Protestant grounds of faith, against the pretence of infallibility in the Roman Church in answer to The guide in controversies by R.H., Protestancy without principles, and Reason and religion, or, The certain rule of faith by E.W. : with a particular enquiry into the miracles of the Roman Church / by Edward Stillingfleet ...
titleStmt.author: Stillingfleet, Edward, 1635-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.W. for H. Mortlock ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library and Duke University Library.
Forms pt. 2 of his "An answer to several late treatises occasioned by a book entitled, A discourse concerning the idolatry practised in the Church of Rome. The first part." (Wing S5559).
